allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Teamschedule full-stack application

- Angular 19 frontend with Material Design 3
- Apollo GraphQL backend with Node.js
- PostgreSQL database
- Docker compose setup for all services
- Direct Apollo Client v4 integration \(no apollo-angular\)

Tech Stack:
- Frontend: Angular 19.2, Material Design 3, Apollo Client v4
- Backend: Node.js, Apollo Server, TypeScript
- Database: PostgreSQL 16
- Infrastructure: Docker, Docker Compose

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
